> [truehistory](#comment_1_1PNiJqWCetrsA1yV9jdDUwRBY4mdYRLGSV): A 'Jewish survivor' former inmate's only complain about Auschwitz was that the beer was 'weakish'(low alcohol level).

In an open restaurant people can go elsewhere if they don't like the beer. But in a closed camp some people can get really angry in such situations and later they could take revenge.
And of course everybody can be guilty but not a Jew.

After 70 years, in 2016 UK declassified secret acts about Jewish terrorism in Palestine. Jews started terrorism long before the Arabs did it.
http://www.foxnews.com/world/2016/09/27/uk-opens-secret-files-about-jewish-terrorists-in-140s.html
The informations still are sensitive and from most countries may not be seen. If blocked try here:
https://web.archive.org/web/20161009102106/http://www.foxnews.com/world/2016/09/27/uk-opens-secret-files-about-jewish-terrorists-in-140s.html
